analysis.description: C3Wallet.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x19055b944806fba2717dc694cf0173a1eb2d1604.sol#281-291) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x19055b944806fba2717dc694cf0173a1eb2d1604.sol:
	Contract C3Wallet has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x19055b944806fba2717dc694cf0173a1eb2d1604.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
tkn in ERC223ReceivingContract.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x19055b944806fba2717dc694cf0173a1eb2d1604.sol#58) is a local variable never initialiazed

C3Wallet.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x19055b944806fba2717dc694cf0173a1eb2d1604.sol#281-291)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x19055b944806fba2717dc694cf0173a1eb2d1604.sol#286-291
